champ.name: Champagne Room
champ.desc: Absolutely no sex is allowed here. There are chairs arranged around a coffee table with magazines in the center of the room. There is one drug on the table next to a spoon.

action.take drug: Better take this so no one gets hurt

object.drug: Rolled up tube of sand and plants
object.spoon: This spoon is shiny and tiny. Could fit easily into a jar of peanut butter
object.magazine: The cover reads, Glue Enthusiasts Quarterly, issue #352. The pages are stuck together firmly

quiet.name: Quiet Room
quiet.desc: The walls are covered with art that seems misguided. This room is for relaxing, and you can tell. Plants grow from the ceiling in long vines.

object.plant: These plants look like they've been here a long time
object.art: Not quite to your taste, but a good atempt all the same

sun.name: Sun Room
sun.desc: Light spills in from the 3 walls of windows around you. There is a large pile of sand with a stingray floating lazily above it

action.pet stingray: Your pats seem appreciated as it coos slightly and nuzzles against your hand

object.stingray: Such a beautiful and misunderstood creature
object.sand: This is the good stuff. Pure Columbia by the looks of it
